mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENTHISTORY(MEMBERID, PAYDATE, PAYAMOUNT, PAYKINDS, DOMITORYNAME, UNIVERSITYCODE) VALUES(#{memberId},now(),#{payAmount},#{payKinds}, #{domitoryname}, #{universitycode})
mapper.select: SELECT p.payidx, p.memberid, p.paydate, p.payamount, p.paykinds from PAYMENTHISTORY p left JOIN MEMBER m ON p.memberid=m.memberid WHERE m.universitycode=#{universitycode} ORDER BY payidx DESC
SELECT payIdx, memberId, payDate, payAmount, payKinds from PAYMENTHISTORY WHERE memberId=#{memberId} ORDER BY payidx DESC;
